prompts: Create a small, green Pokemon that can blend into rocky terrains and has a fierce gaze.
I want a Pokemon inspired by dinosaurs, featuring a stout body and a tough exterior.
Generate a creature that evolves from a small rock-like form into a giant beast with spikes.
Make a ground-type Pokemon with earthy tones, capable of causing tremors with its movements.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous areas, with a personality that reflects resilience.
Design a creature that has a playful yet determined demeanor, with a rocky, rugged appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a mini dinosaur, featuring both green and red colors.
